data.title: Bengt Forslund Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Bengt Forslund on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Bengt Forslund including Here's Your Life.
data.text: Bengt Forslund is a Swedish film producer, screenwriter and production manager. He produced and co-wrote The Emigrants, for which he was nominated for Academy Awards for both Best Picture and Writing Adapted Screenplay. At the 8th Guldbagge Awards he won the Special Achievement award.
